Text: Important ProfilePST Military Resale Group Inc Corporate Profile January Executive Circle Colorado Springs CO Telephone Facsimile Ticker Symbol OTCBB MYRG Shares Outstanding Estimated Float Week Range Company Contact Mr Ethan D Hokit President Military Resale Group Inc OTCBBMYRG recently became a new publiclyowned company as a result of its acquisition in December by Bactrol Technologies Inc MYRG markets and distributes groceries and related products to commissaries on US military bases in the Colorado area where our operating roots go back five decades Previously a publiclytraded corporate shell Bactrol Technologies acquired Military Resale Group in a reverse acquisition leaving million shares outstanding and only million shares in the public float MYRG was incorporated in when it acquired Pittock Distributors Inc a fiftyyear old firm specializing in distribution of products to the Military Resale Market At the time of the acquisition of Pittock it had approximately in revenue Revenue has increased over fivefold x in the past four years reaching million in MYRG believes that revenue can increase to a million annualized rate by the end of with the existing facilities President Ethan Hokit and GM Bob Hefner have each been in the local military resale market for over years The Military Resale Market is a billion niche market with authorized patrons which operates under the aegis of the Defense Commissary Agency DeCA a Department of Defense DOD agency The DODs objective in this activity is to operate resale store systems that sell groceries at commissaries and general merchandise at exchanges ie PXs at the lowest possible prices The resulting average cost savings last year of make the system a major fringe benefit untaxed to military personnel The competitive structure of the Military Resale Market consists of a few large distributors that do not dominate the industry and hundreds of smaller distributors MYRGs longterm strategy is to grow primarily by acquiring other small distributors and also by internal growth Positive Investment Theme The Military Resale Market for groceriesmerchandise is a billion a year niche industry authorized patrons benefit from lower prices about and onpost shopping convenience Demand is cyclically stable due to the basic product nature and military headcount Distributors require some specialized knowledge a barrier to entry in this industry regulated by DeCA Defense Commissary Agency The shares possess several appealing investment features A They are statistically attractive as measured by the Market ValueSales Ratio MYRGs market value is currently about million This is only x actual sales of million and only x projected sales of about million which is well below the level of the Market ValueSales ratio for most stocks B The float is thin containing only million shares C A stock play on the Military Resale Market is a new idea to investors and is defensive in a weaker economic setting MYRG has set a target of reaching a trading range of per share by yearend so that it can seek a national exchange listing
